title: How do you preserve memories of special days?

korean: 특별한 날의 추억을 보존하는 방법은 여러 가지가 있어요.
요즘은 스마트폰으로 쉽게 찍을 수 있으니까 정말 많이 찍는 편이에요.
중요한 사진들은 인화해서 앨범에 보관하기도 해요.
디지털로만 보관하면 언젠가 잃어버릴 수 있잖아요.
그리고 SNS에 그날의 이야기를 글로 남기곤 해요.
인스타그램이나 블로그에 사진과 함께 느낌을 적어두는 거죠.
나중에 보면 그때 어떤 생각을 했는지 떠올릴 수 있어서 좋아요.
특별한 날에 받은 선물이나 티켓 같은 것도 간직해요.
추억 상자 만들어서 거기에 모아두곤 하거든요.
가끔 그 상자 열어보면 옛날 생각이 나서 좋더라고요.
이렇게 여러 방법으로 추억을 보존하려고 노력하는 것 같아요.
잊어버렸던 구체적인 순간들이 생각나면서 미소 짓게 돼요.
특별한 순간은 단 한 번뿐이니까 계속 간직하고 싶거든요.
english: So I actually have several different ways that I use to preserve memories of really special days in my life.
First and most obviously, I make sure to take tons of photos throughout the day to capture every moment.
These days it's super easy since you can just use your smartphone camera, so honestly I end up taking hundreds of pictures.
For the most meaningful and important photos, I actually take the time to print them out and store them carefully in physical albums.
I do this because if you only keep photos digitally on your phone or computer, there's always a risk you might lose them someday.
I also like to write down detailed stories and reflections about those special days on social media platforms.
For example, I'll post on Instagram or write longer blog entries where I include photos along with my thoughts and feelings from that day.
This is really helpful because when I go back and read them later, I can vividly remember exactly what I was thinking and feeling then.
Another thing I do is keep physical items like meaningful gifts or event tickets that I received on those special occasions.
I have this dedicated memory box where I carefully collect and organize all these sentimental items from important moments.
Sometimes when I open that box and look through everything, it's honestly so nice because all those old memories and emotions come flooding back.
I'll find myself smiling while remembering specific details I had almost forgotten about.
Overall, I think I genuinely try to preserve my precious memories in as many different ways as possible.
Because these special moments only happen once, and I want to be able to relive them for years to come, you know?
